bibl.title: Un chat, un porc et les dieux. Les terres cuites du Fayoum au Musée municipal de Lokeren.
Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part I
bibl.author: WARMENBOL, Eugène

bibl.note: 17 terres cuites romaines d'Égypte [anc. collection Gustave Maes (1851-1904)].

Willy CLARYSSE, Antoon SCHOORS and Harco WILLEMS (Edd.), Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 84 (Leuven, 1998) pp. 265-286, 8 pll.
